/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their white facades gleaming under the sunlight. The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of the city.
